name: Me in the Office
description:
At first glance looks like a typical day in the office, but now your responsibilities are completely different. Pick up furniture, throw and smash it. Destroy walls, floor and celling. Get rid of the third floor or demolish the building to the base. Make employees dance, run or throw furniture - this will help to make a fuss. Explore the office building and find the way to destroy it in a new way.


MAIN FEATURES:


  • Become an empathetic colleague

    You see an employee hard working at his workplace? Crash his chair and table, so he can rest up for a little while.

  • Make open space more open

    Destroy the large three-floor office to the base.

  • Make something really crazy

    Play in various odd game modes such as Total Diarrhea, Froggy, etc.

  • Relax and have fun

    If you are tired of carrying and throwing objects, you can make your colleagues dance or run to help you cope with the correction of office architecture.
